thread.title: Gray Dawes acquires Travel Focus Limited
thread.title_full: Gray Dawes acquires Travel Focus Limited

title: Gray Dawes acquires Travel Focus Limited
text:
0 comments Tom Newcombe Wed, 14 Oct 2015 12:06 Gray Dawes has announced the acquisition of Travel Focus Limited including the trading business of Events in Focus.
The acquisition follows on from the purchase earlier this year of The Business Travel Partnership .
Gray Dawes CEO Suzanne Horner, said: “I am delighted to welcome the staff and customers of Travel Focus to our rapidly expanding business.
“The move fits with our core goal to re-establish Gray Dawes as a key player in the UK corporate travel arena. The Travel Focus and Events in Focus business adds breadth and scale to Gray Dawes and is a natural fit in terms of our strategic aim to continue to develop our Events solutions business.”
Travel Focus Limited MD Brian Cooper said: “I have great respect for Suzanne Horner and the direction in which she is leading the Gray Dawes business.
“This agreement builds on the service reputation created by my team over many years and brings exciting new opportunities for staff and customers of Travel Focus and Events in Focus.”
